name: La Chute de Satan
description:
La Chute de Satan

La Chute de Satan is a VR experience in which you are immersed in a virtual exhibition of original paintings-illustrations representing moments of Satan's Fall myth. In a neutral exhibition room, you are invited to change the way you « visit » in order to explore the different paintings you are confronted with, and change your experience of the exhibition.




Indeed, as you get closer, the paintings change, each of them in a unique way, and it reveals another side of themself.

Exploring the potential of virtual visits, questionning space and 2D/3D dimensions, the idea is to encourage the visitor to change their perspective which, at first, looked more than normal, as well as to explore the different way to interprete a piece of art as a creator.

Credits

Creators: Noëlie Delesse, Pierre Lepercq, Magali WalchBased on paintings-illustration by Magali Walch.
Country: France
Release Year: 2019

Specifications

Play Area: 3 meters x 3 meters
Headset: Occulus Rift, HTC Vive
Public: Everyone


This short experience  was made in one week by a team of Bachelor Students.
